246244.「いらっしゃい しもべさん。\n あらためまして 私は 元締めのジルガモット。\:
Welcome, Mr. Servant. I am Jirgamot, the head of the bazaar. Yushka told me. Yushka told me that he ordered you
to solve the bazaar's problems. That's refreshingly circular. However, I also expect you to cooperate willingly, and
not just because I'm ordering you to. Of course, I'm prepared to pay you handsomely for your help. How's that?
Will you help us with our bazaar?

246245.「ふふ……いい お返事。\n しもべさん どうぞ よろしくね。\n<br>\n「:
I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Shimobe-san, please accept my regards. As I told you before, the bazaar is
running out of goods because the traders carrying goods from the Dinga Trade Post are being attacked by
monsters in Zumul Pass. Monsters keep appearing one after another, and since we can't rely on the military, it's
more practical to open up another trade route. We need to use the Dinga Barrier near the Dinga Trade Post to
allow safe passage for our traders. But there is a slight problem with that barrier.There is an
archaeologist, Mapricot, who is looking into it, and I was wondering if you could go there and talk to him.
It's northeast of Farazard. If you have any questions, just ask. Work hard, servant.

246246.「ふふ……いい お返事。\n そんな あなただから\n 今も 頼まれごとで 手い:
I'm so glad to hear from you. Since you're like that, you must have your hands full with requests right now.
Can you come back after you finish your other business? But as soon as possible.

come back as soon as possible.

takes off his clothes. I can only imagine what Nazine-sama is going through.

252750.「ファラザードの魔王にとって 欠かせない存在 \n それが 副官のナジーン様よ。:
The Demon King of Farazard has one indispensable asset: his second-in- command, Nazine. When the Demon King
is not available, he is deputized. Most of the time, Nazine handles the more complicated cases that don't get
publicity behind the scenes. It's like the Demon King's shadow! Just like the Demon King's shadow. By the way, he's
a gekko...he gets sleepy after just one drink. He has a surprisingly cute weakness in his face.

252751.「ファラザードの魔王は 交易をすることで\n 人と物を集めて 国を大きくしたの。:
The Demon King of Farazard grew his country through trade, bringing people and goods together. Sales from the
bazaar are especially important. The man who carries the weight and the trust is Jirgamot, the head of the
gang. He has a beautiful smile, but he's also very clever. By the way, he's a bazaarfly... I think if I tried
to hit on you over drinks, you'd probably go down first.
